meanings.definition: One who alerts or gives warning.
meanings.sent1: The alerter shouted loudly to warn everyone about the fire.
meanings.sent2: The alerter at the school always makes sure to notify everyone of any emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The alerter's voice was so loud that even the birds stopped chirping to listen.
meanings.sent4: She was like an alerter beacon in the dark, guiding us to safety.
meanings.sent5: The alerter's message was clear and urgent, impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: A device or system that gives a signal or warning.
meanings.sent1: The alerter on the phone buzzed loudly to notify of the incoming storm.
meanings.sent2: The alerter in the building rang shrilly when the fire alarm was triggered.
meanings.sent3: The alerter on the door made a funny sound like a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent4: The alerter on the ship was like a vigilant guardian, always ready to sound the alarm.
meanings.sent5: The alerter's red light flashed urgently, catching everyone's attention.
